OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive docetaxel IV 1 hour bevacizumab IV 30-90 minute day 1 . Patients also receive oral capecitabine twice daily day 1-14 . Courses repeat every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients achieve complete response ( CR ) receive least 2 additional course beyond CR .
